pages.title: Artron Capacitor
pages.text: Upgraded form of the basic capacitor. Stores up to 128 AU per capacitor, for a total of 1,280 AU, and a recharge rate of 1.0. Serviceable in relatively small numbers. Can be upgraded into the high capacitor.

pages.title: Artron Battery
pages.text: Upgraded form of the basic battery. Can hold up to 750 AU per battery, with a charge rate of 2.0, and a discharge rate of 0.5. Can be upgraded into the high battery.
